Workspace Commands       | 
-------------------------|-----
Command Palette          | {{< kbd win=Ctrl-shift-p mac=Command-Shift-P >}}
Search & open file       | {{< kbd win=Ctrl-p mac=Command-P >}}
Toggle Sidebar           | {{< kbd win=Ctrl-B mac=Command-B >}}
Split editor             | {{< kbd mac=Shift-Ctrl-Option-Command-7 >}}
Switch to editor split   | {{< kbd mac=Command-1 >}} / {{< kbd mac=Command-2 >}} / {{< kbd mac=Command-3 >}}
Switch to tab            | {{< kbd mac=Ctrl-1 >}} / {{< kbd mac=Ctrl-2 >}}
Close tab                | {{< kbd mac=Command-W >}}
Reopen closed tab        | {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-T >}}

:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}

Switch between Views     |
-------------------------|-----
Show File explorer       | {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-E >}}
Show Debug View          | {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-D >}}
Show Find View           | {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-F >}}
Show Git View            | {{< kbd mac=Ctrl-Shift-G >}}

:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}

Code Navigation                | 
-------------------------------|-----
Go to line                     | {{< kbd Ctrl-G >}} / {{< kbd win=Ctrl-P Mac=Command-P >}} {{< kbd : >}}
Go to beginning / end of line  | {{< kbd mac=Command&larr; win=Home >}} {{< kbd mac=Command&rarr; win=End >}}
Go to beginning / end of word  | {{< kbd mac=Option&larr; win=Alt-&larr; >}} {{< kbd mac=Option&rarr; win=Alt-&rarr; >}}
Go to matching bracket         | {{< kbd mac=Ctrl-Option-Command-7 >}}
Go to symbol/function          | {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-o >}}
    
:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}

Code Editing             | 
-------------------------|-----
Copy line                | {{< kbd mac=Command-C  >}}
Cut line                 | {{< kbd mac=Command-X  >}}
Delete line              | {{< kbd mac=Command-Shift-K  >}}
Outdent line             | {{< kbd win=Ctrl-' mac=Ctrl-Option-Command-5  >}}
Toggle comment line      | {{< kbd win=Ctrl-§ mac=Command-Shift-7 >}}
Move line up or down     | {{< kbd Option&uarr; >}} / {{< kbd Option&darr; >}}
Copy line up or down     | {{< kbd Option-shift&uarr; >}} / {{< kbd Option-Shift&darr; >}}
Add cursor below/above   | {{< kbd mac=Option-Command&uarr; >}} / {{< kbd mac=Option-Command&darr; >}}
Find and replace         | {{< kbd mac=Command-Option-F >}}

:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}


Code selection           | 
-------------------------|-----
Select line          | {{< kbd mac=Command-L win=Ctrl-L Linux=Ctrl-L >}}
Expand selection     | {{< kbd Shift-Option&rarr; >}}

:  {tbl-colwidths="[50,50]"}
